name: Sweet Breakfast Cheesecake
author: Melissa Boos
summary: My Mom makes this for work parties. I used it recently when I brought breakfast to everyone at work one day and it went FAST! Everyone asks me when I'm bringing it again and several people wanted the recipe!
ingredients: 1 ½ sticks butter, at room temperature
directions: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Roll out 1 1/2 packages of crescent roll dough into a rectangle and place into a 11x13-inch baking pan
Press together to form a crust
Combine cream cheese, 1 1/2 cups sugar, and vanilla extract in a bowl; beat with an electric mixer until creamy
Roll out remaining 1 1/2 packages of crescent roll dough and place on top of the cream cheese mixture
Cream together butter, remaining 1 1/2 cups sugar, and cinnamon in a bowl
Spread over the second crescent roll layer
Bake in the preheated oven until puffed up and golden, 30 to 35 minutes
